alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hettinger; Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:24PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL HETTINGER, NORTHWESTERN MORTON AND NORTHWESTERN GRANT COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/... At 1024 PM CDT/924 PM MDT/, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of New Salem to 8 miles northwest of New Leipzig. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Almont around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Elgin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT/200 AM MDT/ for south central North Dakota.
